## GradientStopCollection.RemoveAt method

Removes a gradient stop at the specified index.

```csharp
public void RemoveAt(int index)
```

| Parameter | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| index | Int32 | Index of a gradient stop that should be deleted. |
